mapper.select:
update b_s_003
jkbz=#{jkbz},
ID = id
where ID = #{id}

select t1.id, t1.jh, t1.cj, t1.xlh, (CASE WHEN t5.zjh IS NULL THEN t1.zjh ELSE t5.zjh END) zjh, (select zwms from d_005 where (CASE WHEN t5.zjh IS NULL THEN t1.zjh ELSE t5.zjh END)=zjh AND t1.dprtcode = dprtcode) zjhzwms, (CASE WHEN t5.zwms IS NULL THEN t1.zwmc ELSE t5.zwms END) zwmc, (CASE WHEN t5.ywms IS NULL THEN t1.ywmc ELSE t5.ywms END) ywmc, t1.fjzch, t1.bjlx, t1.kzlx, t1.tsn, t1.dprtcode, t1.tso, t1.wz, t1.gdid, t1.rwid, t1.jkbz, t2.gdbh, t3.rwdh, t2.zt as gdzt, t6.dprtname, (select t_user.username || ' ' || t_user.realname from t_user where t_user.id = t2.zdrid) gdwhr, to_char(t2.zdsj, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') gdwhsj, (select t_user.username || ' ' || t_user.realname from t_user where t_user.id = t3.whrid) rwwhr, to_char(t3.whsj, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') rwwhsj from b_s_003 t1 left join b_g_007 t2 on t1.gdid = t2.id left join b_s_009 t3 on t1.rwid = t3.id and t3.zt in (1,2) left join d_008 t5 on t1.jh = t5.bjh and t1.dprtcode = t5.dprtcode and t5.zt=1 left join t_department t6 on t1.dprtcode=t6.id
order by ${pagination.sort} ${pagination.order}

select t1.id, t1.jh, t1.xlh, (CASE WHEN t5.zjh IS NULL THEN t1.zjh ELSE t5.zjh END) zjh, (CASE WHEN t5.zwms IS NULL THEN t1.zwmc ELSE t5.zwms END) zwmc, (CASE WHEN t5.ywms IS NULL THEN t1.ywmc ELSE t5.ywms END) ywmc, t1.fjzch, t1.bjlx, t1.kzlx, t1.tsn, t1.dprtcode, t1.tso, t1.wz, t1.gdid, t1.rwid, t1.jkbz, t2.gdbh, t3.rwdh, t2.zt as gdzt, (select t_user.username || ' ' || t_user.realname from t_user where t_user.id = t2.zdrid) gdwhr, to_char(t2.zdsj, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') gdwhsj, (select t_user.username || ' ' || t_user.realname from t_user where t_user.id = t3.whrid) rwwhr, to_char(t3.whsj, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') rwwhsj from b_s_003 t1 left join b_g_007 t2 on t1.gdid = t2.id left join b_s_009 t3 on t1.rwid = t3.id left join d_008 t5 on t1.jh = t5.bjh and t5.zt=1 and t1.dprtcode = t5.dprtcode
